class.rdfs:comment: A set of requirements that a must be fulfilled in order to perform an Action.
class.rdfs:label: ActionAccessSpecification

schema:availabilityEnds.rdfs:comment: The end of the availability of the product or service included in the offer.
schema:availabilityEnds.rdfs:label: availabilityEnds

schema:availabilityStarts.rdfs:comment: The beginning of the availability of the product or service included in the offer.
schema:availabilityStarts.rdfs:label: availabilityStarts

schema:category.rdfs:comment: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.
schema:category.rdfs:label: category

schema:eligibleRegion.rdfs:comment: The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is valid.\n\nSee also [[ineligibleRegion]].
schema:eligibleRegion.rdfs:label: eligibleRegion

schema:expectsAcceptanceOf.rdfs:comment: An Offer which must be accepted before the user can perform the Action. For example, the user may need to buy a movie before being able to watch it.
schema:expectsAcceptanceOf.rdfs:label: expectsAcceptanceOf

schema:ineligibleRegion.rdfs:comment: The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is not valid, e.g. a region where the transaction is not allowed.\n\nSee also [[eligibleRegion]].
schema:ineligibleRegion.rdfs:label: ineligibleRegion

schema:requiresSubscription.rdfs:comment: Indicates if use of the media require a subscription  (either paid or free). Allowed values are ```true``` or ```false``` (note that an earlier version had 'yes', 'no').
schema:requiresSubscription.rdfs:label: requiresSubscription
